p: The essential oils were obtained by hydrodistillation in a stainless steel distiller equipped with a Clevenger apparatus. All essential oils were obtained performing three distinct distillations and essential oil (moisture-free) yield was 0.68% for O. micranthum, 0.13% for O. quixos, and 0.12% for P. aduncum, respectively. The oil was dried over anhydrous sodium sulphate and stored in sealed amber vials at 4 °C.
